channel.title: Few Question Read
channel.description:
Ok first off all how do i make an item such as wings be a ring instead of being a wepoen?
So i mean when i equipt it it takes my wepeon off and goes in my wepeon slot how do i put it so it goes in the ring slot?
How do i make a command like if you do ::tc you join a clan it tells you the people in the clan and it give you the clan armour?

item.title: Few Question Read
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

Well for your first question item.java and put the id in the rings place.
For the second question i assume u could put a boolean like this

public boolean isInClan = false;

Under implements runnable
(I hope that works if not put in player.java)

Then make ur command

if (command.equalsignorecase(“tk”) && isInClan == false) {
isInClan = true;
addItem(clan armor, 1);
(repeat for how many clan items)
and then u would have to make a sendtoclan
Kind of thing
But my code only allows one clan and it is just an idea copying and pasting it will not work i am just helping you show how if you want anything cleared ill be happy to help

Read full topic
